americanEnglishGovern: In th' event 'o a discrepancy in th' translations, th' American English version governs.
helpWithTranslation: Would ye like to help wit' t' translation of HabiRPG? Great! Then visit 'tis Trello card.
showHeaderPop: Show yer avatarr, Health/Experience bars, and crew.
stickyHeaderPop: Affix th' header to th' top o' th' screen. Unchecked means it scrolls out o' view.
newTaskEdit: Open ye new tasks in edit mode
newTaskEditPop: Wit' 'tis option set, new tasks gunna immediately open fer ye to add details like notes 'n tags.
dailyDueDefaultView: Set ye Dailies default t' 'due' tab
dailyDueDefaultViewPop: Wit' 'tis option set, th' Dailies tasks gunna default to 'due' instead 'o 'all'
reverseChatOrder: Show yer chat messages in reverse ord'r
startAdvCollapsed: Advanced Settings in ye tasks start collapsed
startAdvCollapsedPop: With this option set, Advanced Settings'll be hidden when ya first open a task fer editing.
suppressLevelUpModal: Don't show popup when gainin' a level
suppressHatchPetModal: Don't show popup when hatchin' a pet
suppressRaisePetModal: Don't show popup when raisin' a pet into a mount
suppressStreakModal: Don't show popup when attainin' a Streak achievement
restartTour: Restart th' introductory tour from when ye first joined Habitica.
showBaileyPop: Bring Bailey the First Mate out o' hidin' so ye can review past news.
fixValPop: Manually change values like Health, Level, an' Doubloons.
invalidLevel: Invalid value: Ye level must be 1 or greater.
enableClassPop: Ye opted out 'o th' class system initially. Would ye like now t' opt-in?
classTourPop: Show th' tour fer usin' th' class system.
resetAccPop: Start over, removin' all levels, doubloons, gear, history, 'n tasks.
deleteAccPop: Cancel an' remove yer Habitica account.
feedback: If ya'd like t' give us feedback, enter it below - we'd love t' know what ya liked or didn't like 'bout Habitica! Don't speak English good? No worries, mate! Use the language ya prefer.
saveData: Here're a few options fer saving yer data.
sureChangeCustomDayStartTime: Are ya sure ya want t' change yer Custom Day Start time? Yer Dailies'll next reset the first time ya use Habitica after <%= time %>. Make sure ya've completed yer Dailies before then!
sureChangeCustomDayStart: Arr ye sure ye want t' change yer custom day start?
customDayStartHasChanged: Yer custom day start has changed.
nextCron: Yer Dailies will next reset the first time you use Habitica after <%= time %>. Ye better be sure ye've completed yer Dailies by that time!
customDayStartInfo1: Habitica defaults t' check an' reset yer Dailies at midnight in yer own time zone ev'ry day. Ye c'n customize that time here.
resetText1: AHOY! 'tis resets many parts 'o ye account. 'tis be highly discouraged, but some people find it useful in th' beginnin' after playin' wit' th' site fer a short time.
resetText2: Ya'll lose all yer levels, Gold, and 'xperience points. All o' yer tasks (except those from them challenges) will be deleted permanently and ya'll lose all o' their historical data. Ya'll lose all yer equipment but ya 'll be able t' buy it all back, includin' all lim'ted 'dition equipment or subscriber Myst'ry items tha' ya already own (ya'll need t' be in the correct class t' re-buy class-specific gear). Ya'll keep yer current class and yer pets and mounts. Ya might prefer t' use an Orb of Rebirth instead, which be a much safer option and which'll preserve yer tasks and equipment.
deleteLocalAccountText: Are ye sure? This will scuttle yer account forever, 'n it can ne'er be restored! Ye will needs t' register a new account t' use Habitica again. Banked or spent Gems will nah be refunded. If ye're absolutely certain ye wish to walk the plank, type yer password into th' text box below.
deleteSocialAccountText: Are ya sure? This'll delete yer account forever, and it can never be restored! Ya'll need t' register a new account t' use Habitica again. Banked or spent Gems'll not be refunded. If ya're completely shore, type "<%= magicWord %>" into the text box below.
APIText: Copy these fer use in third parrrty applications. However, think 'o ye API Token like a passcode, 'n do not share it publicly. Ye may occasionally be asked fer yer User ID, but never message yer API Token whar others can spy wit' ye eye it, includin' on Github.
APIToken: API Token ('tis be a passcode - see warnin' above!)
APITokenWarning: If ye needs a new API Token (e.g., if ye accidentally shared it), email <%= hrefTechAssistanceEmail %> wit' yer User ID 'n current Token. Once 'tis reset ye will needs t' re-authorize everythin' by loggin' out o' th' website 'n mobile app 'n by providin' th' new Token t' any other Habitica tools that ye use.
dataToolDesc: A webpage that be showin' ye certain information from yer Habitica account, such as statistics about yer tasks, equipment, 'n skills.
beeminderDesc: Let Beeminder automatically monitor yer Habitica To-Dos. Ye can commit to maintaining a target number of To-Dos completed per sundown or per week, or ye can commit to gradually reducing yer remaining number o' uncompleted To-Dos. (By "commit" Beeminder means under threat of paying actual money! But ye may also just like Beeminder's fancy graphs.)
chromeChatExtensionDesc: Th' Chrome Chat Extension fer Habitica adds n' intuitive chat box t' all o' habitica.com. It allows pirates to chat in th' Tavern, their party, 'n any guilds they be in.
otherDesc: Find oth'r apps, extensions, 'n tools on th' Habitica wiki.
fixValuesText1: If ye've encountered a bug or made a mistake that unfairly changed yer character (damage ye shouldn't have taken, Doubloons ye didn't really earn, etc.), ye can manually correct yer numbers here. Yarr, 'tis makes it possible to cheat: use 'tis weapon wisely, or ye'll sabotage yer own habit-buildin'!
fixValuesText2: Note that ye cannot restore Streaks on individual tasks here. T' do that, edit th' Daily 'n go t' Advanced Settin's, where ye will find a Restore Streak field.
disabledWinterEvent: Disabled durin' Winter Wonderland Event Pt.4 (since th' rewards be doubloon-purchaseable).
invalidPasswordResetCode: Th' suppli'd password reset code be invalid or has expired.
passwordChangeSuccess: Yer password was successfully changed t' th' one ye jus' chose. Ye can now use it t' access yer account.
detachedSocial: Successfully remov'd <%= network %> authentication from yer account
loginNameDescription: 'tis wha' ye use t' log in t' Habitica. T' change it, use th' form below. If instead ye wants t' change th' Display Name that appears on yer avatar 'n in chat messages, go t' th' Pirate Icon > Profile 'n jab th' Edit button.
giftedGemsFull: Ahoy <%= username %>, <%= sender %> has sent ye <%= gemAmount %> sapphires!
giftedSubscriptionInfo: <%= name %> gift'd ye a <%= months %> month subscr'ption
giftedSubscriptionFull: Ahoy <%= username %>, <%= sender %> has sent ye <%= monthCount %> months o' subscr'ption!
giftedSubscriptionWinterPromo: Ahoy <%= username %>, ye rece'ved <%= monthCount %> months of subscr'ption as part o' our holiday gift-givin' promotion!
importantAnnouncements: Remind'rs t' check in t' complete tasks 'n rece've prizes
weeklyRecaps: Summaries o' ye account activity in th' past week (Note: this be currently disabled due t' performance issues, but we hope t' have this back up an' sendin' e-mails again soon!)
onboarding: Guidance wit' settin' up yer Habitica account
remindersToLogin: Reminders t' check in t' Habitica
unsubscribedTextUsers: Ye 'ave successfully unsubscrib'd from all Habitica emails. Ye can enable only th' emails ye wants t' receive from Settin's > > Notifications (requires login).
unsubscribedTextOthers: Ye won't receive any other email from Habitica.
unsubscribeAllEmailsText: By checkin' this box, I certify that I understand that by unsubscribing from all emails, Habitica will never be able t' notify me via email about important changes t' th' site or my account.
unsubscribeAllPush: Check t' Unsubscribe from all Push Notifications
subscriptionRateText: Recurring $<%= price %> USD every <%= months %> moons
couponText: We sometimes have events an' give out coupon codes for special gear. (eg, those who stop by our Wondercon booth)
promoCodeApplied: Promo Code Applied! Check yer inventory
displayInviteToPartyWhenPartyIs1: Display Invite T'â€‰ Crew button when crew has 1 member.
webhooksInfo: Habitica provides webhooks so that when certain actions occur in yer account, information can be sent t' a script on another website. Ye can specify those scripts here. Be careful wit' this feature 'cause specifyin' an incorrect URL can cause errors or slowness in Habitica. Fer more information, see th' wiki's Webhooks page.
invalidEnabled: th' "enabl'd" parameter should be a boolean.
invalidWebhookId: th' "id" parameter should be a valid UUID.
invalidWebhookType: "<%= type %>" does not be a valid value fer th' parameter "type".
webhookBooleanOption: "<%= option %>" must be a Boolean value.
webhookIdAlreadyTaken: A webhook wit' th' id <%= id %> already exists.
noWebhookWithId: Thar be no webhook wit' th' id <%= id %>.
invalidPushClient: Invalid client. Only Official Habitica clients can rece've push notifications.
pushDeviceAlreadyAdded: The user already has th' push device
pushDeviceNotFound: Th' pirate has no push device wit' this id.
mysticHourglassText: Mystic Hourglasses allow ye to purchase a previous moon's Mystery Item set.
purchasedPlanId: Recurring $<%= price %> USD each <%= months %> Moon(s) (<%= plan %>)
purchasedPlanExtraMonths: Ye've <%= months %> months o' extra subscription credit.
amazonPaymentsRecurring: Tickin' th' checkbox below be necessary fer yer subscription t' be created. It allows yer Amazon account t' be used fer ongoin' payments fer this subscription. 'twon't cause yer Amazon account t' be automatically used fer any future purchases.
timezoneUTC: Habitica uses the time zone set on yer PC, which is: <%= utc %>
timezoneInfo:
If that time zone is wrong, first reload this page using yer browser's reload or refresh button t' ensure that Habitica has th' most recent information. If it is still wrong, adjust th' time zone on yer PC an' then reload this page again.

If ye use Habitica on other PCs or mobile devices, th' time zone must be the same on them all. If yer Dailies have been resetting at th' wrong time, repeat this check on all other PCs an' on a browser on your mobile devices.
setUsernameNotificationBody: We shall be transitionin' login names t' unique, public seanames soon. This seaname will be used fer invitations, @mentions in chat, 'n messagin'.
usernameIssueSlur: Seanames may not contain inappropriate language.
usernameIssueForbidden: Seanames may not contain restricted words.
usernameIssueLength: Seanames must be between 1 and 20 charact'rs.
usernameIssueInvalidCharacters: Seanames can only contain lett'rs a t' z, numb'rs 0 t' 9, hyphens, or underscores.
displaynameIssueLength: Displayed Pirate Names must be between 1 n' 30 charact'rs.
displaynameIssueSlur: Displayed Pirate Names may not contain inappropriate language.
changeUsernameDisclaimer: We shall be transitionin' login names t' unique, public seanames soon. This seaname will be used fer invitations, @mentions in chat, 'n messagin'.
verifyUsernameVeteranPet: One o' these Veteran Pets will be waitin' fer ye after ye've finish'd confirmin'!
